title: Crew Show (GTI and M240i Deep Dives, why winter tires?, Mars, Q&A)
description:
We go deep on our time with the new 2022 GTI and the 2022 BMW M240i X-drive, because the internet has a lot of questions about both of them. We also talk about the Bridgestone Winter Driving academy, all-seasons vs snow tires; when maintenance should be priced into a negotiation; what car we would drive on Mars; which car to buy for Auto-X; and more! 

Recorded on Feb 10, 2022

 

Want to find the right parts for you car? Head to https://carparts.com/thesmokingtire and get 10% off a purchase of $100 or more.


Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.
 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire16 and use code smokingtire16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts!
 

To get your new wireless plan for just $15 a month, and get the plan shipped to your door for free, go to mintmobile.com/tire.

 

Want your question answered? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
 

Tweet at us!

https://www.Twitter.com/thesmokingtire

https://www.Twitter.com/zackklapman

 

Instagram:

https://www.Instagram.com/thesmokingtire

https://www.Instagram.com/therealzackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
